00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "delta_sigma_adc.h"
00031 #include "middleware\i2c_master.h"
00032 
00033 /* Private types -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00034 typedef union
00035 {
00036   struct
00037   {
00038     unsigned char Res;
00039     unsigned char Low;
00040     unsigned char Mid;
00041     unsigned char High;
00042   } Byte;
00043   s32 Data;
00044 } ADC24_Value_TypeDef;
00045 
00046 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 #define PWRC    0x00
00048 #define PGAC0   0x01
00049 #define PGAC1   0x02
00050 #define PGACS   0x03
00051 #define ADRL    0x04
00052 #define ADRM    0x05
00053 #define ADRH    0x06
00054 #define ADCR0   0x07
00055 #define ADCR1   0x08
00056 #define ADCS    0x09
00057 #define ADCTE   0x0A
00058 #define DAH     0x0B
00059 #define DAL     0x0C
00060 #define DACC    0x0D
00061 #define SIMC0   0x0E
00062 #define SIMTOC  0x10
00063 #define HIRCC   0x11
00064 
00065 #define HIRCF           (1 << 1)
00066 #define EOC             (1 << 1)
00067 #define ADCDL           (1 << 2)
00068 #define ADCOFF          (1 << 5)
00069 
00070 #define VCMEN_VAL       (VCMEN << 7)
00071 #define FADCK_VAL       (FADCK << 0)
00072 #define VGS_VAL         (VGS   << 5)
00073 #define AGS_VAL         (AGS   << 3)
00074 #define PGS_VAL         (PGS   << 0)
00075 
00076 #define INIS_VAL        (INIS  << 6)
00077 #define INX_VAL         (INX   << 4)
00078 #define DCSET_VAL       (DCSET << 1)
00079 #define CHSN_VAL        (CHSN  << 3)
00080 #define CHSP_VAL        (CHSP  << 0)
00081 #define ADOR_VAL        (ADOR  << 1)
00082 #define VREFS_VAL       (VREFS << 0)
00083 #define FLMS_VAL        (FLMS  << 5)
00084 #define VRBUF_VAL       (VRBUF << 3)
00085 #define ADCK_VAL        (ADCK  << 0)
00086 
00087 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00088 static u8 ADC24Buffer[2];
00089 static I2CMaster_Typedef I2CMaster = { 0 };
00090 
00091 static vu32 gIsDRDYB_IntTrigger = FALSE;
00092 static u32 guSamplingCount = 0;
00093 static ADC24_Value_TypeDef ADCValue;
00094 
00095 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00096 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00097   * @brief  Init the ADC.
00098   * @retval None
00099   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00100 void ADC24_Init(void)
00101 {
00102   u8 uRegValue = 0;
00103   I2CMaster_Init(I2C_MASTER_CH0, HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_ADDRESS, HTCFH_I2C_MASTER_CLOCK_SPEED);
00104 
00105   ADC24_WriteReg(HIRCC, 0x01);
00106 
00107   do
00108   {
00109     ADC24_ReadReg(HIRCC, &uRegValue, 1);
00110   } while ((uRegValue & HIRCF) == 0); // Wait HIRC oscillator stable flag
00111 
00112   ADC24_WriteReg(SIMC0,  0x00);
00113   ADC24_WriteReg(SIMTOC, 0x82);
00114   ADC24_WriteReg(PWRC,   VCMEN_VAL | FADCK_VAL);
00115   ADC24_WriteReg(PGAC0,  VGS_VAL | AGS_VAL | PGS_VAL);
00116   ADC24_WriteReg(PGAC1,  INIS_VAL | INX_VAL | DCSET_VAL);
00117   ADC24_WriteReg(PGACS,  CHSN_VAL | CHSP_VAL);
00118   ADC24_WriteReg(ADCR0,  ADOR_VAL | VREFS_VAL);
00119   ADC24_WriteReg(ADCR1,  FLMS_VAL | VRBUF_VAL);
00120   ADC24_WriteReg(ADCS,   ADCK_VAL);
00121   ADC24_WriteReg(ADCTE,  0xE7); // Why??
00122 }
00123 
00124 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00125   * @brief  Start the ADC conversion.
00126   * @retval None
00127   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00128 void ADC24_Start(void)
00129 {
00130   u8 uRegValue = 0;
00131   ADC24_ReadReg(ADCR0, &uRegValue, 1);
00132   ADC24_WriteReg(ADCR0, uRegValue & 0x1F); // ADRST = 0 ADSLP = 0  ADOFF = 0 (ADC power on and enter normal mode)
00133 
00134   ADC24_ReadReg(ADCR0, &uRegValue, 1);
00135   ADC24_WriteReg(ADCR0, uRegValue | 0x80); // ADRST = 1
00136 
00137   ADC24_ReadReg(ADCR0, &uRegValue, 1);
00138   ADC24_WriteReg(ADCR0, uRegValue & 0x7F); // ADRST = 0
00139 }
00140 
00141 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00142   * @brief  Stop the ADC conversion.
00143   * @retval None
00144   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00145 void ADC24_Stop(void)
00146 {
00147   u8 uRegValue = 0;
00148 
00149   ADC24_WriteReg(PWRC, 0x00);
00150   ADC24_ReadReg(ADCR0, &uRegValue, 1);
00151   ADC24_WriteReg(ADCR0, uRegValue | ADCOFF);
00152 }
00153 
00154 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00155   * @brief  Main routine for ADC data read, shall be called regularly.
00156   * @param  pBuffer: Buffer pointer to save ADC value
00157   * @retval FALSE (Data not ready) or TRUE (Data ready)
00158   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00159 u32 ADC24_ReadData_MainRoutine(s32 *pBuffer)
00160 {
00161   u8 uRegValue = 0;
00162   u32 uResult = FALSE;
00163 
00164   if (gIsDRDYB_IntTrigger)
00165   {
00166     gIsDRDYB_IntTrigger = FALSE;
00167 
00168     ADC24_ReadReg(ADCR1, &uRegValue, 1);
00169     if (uRegValue & EOC)
00170     {
00171       guSamplingCount++;
00172       if (guSamplingCount > ADC_SKIP_COUNT)
00173       {
00174         ADC24_WriteReg(ADCR1, uRegValue | ADCDL);    // ADCDL = 1, lock data for read
00175 
00176         ADC24_ReadReg(ADRL, &ADCValue.Byte.Low, 1);
00177         ADC24_ReadReg(ADRM, &ADCValue.Byte.Mid, 1);
00178         ADC24_ReadReg(ADRH, &ADCValue.Byte.High, 1);
00179 
00180         ADC24_WriteReg(ADCR1, uRegValue & (~ADCDL)); // ADCDL = 0, unlock data for ADC convert
00181 
00182         *pBuffer = ADCValue.Data / 256; // Convert to 24-bit signed value
00183         uResult = TRUE;
00184       }
00185       ADC24_WriteReg(ADCR1, uRegValue & (~EOC));
00186     }
00187   }
00188 
00189   return uResult;
00190 }
00191 
00192 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00193   * @brief  Write ADC register (Non-block mode).
00194   * @param  uAddr: Register address
00195   * @param  uValue: Register data
00196   * @retval None
00197   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00198 void ADC24_WriteRegNonBlock(u32 uAddr, u32 uValue)
00199 {
00200   ADC24Buffer[0] = uAddr;
00201   ADC24Buffer[1] = uValue;
00202 
00203   I2CMaster.uSlaveAddress = HFCFG_I2C_SLAVE_ADDRESS;
00204   I2CMaster.Tx.puBuffer = (u8 *)ADC24Buffer;
00205   I2CMaster.Tx.uLength = 2;
00206   I2CMaster.uTimeout_us = 1000000;
00207   I2CMaster_Write(I2C_MASTER_CH0, &I2CMaster);
00208 }
00209 
00210 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00211   * @brief  Write ADC register
00212   * @param  uAddr: Register address
00213   * @param  uValue: Register data
00214   * @retval None
00215   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00216 void ADC24_WriteReg(u32 uAddr, u32 uValue)
00217 {
00218   ADC24_WriteRegNonBlock(uAddr, uValue);
00219   ADC24_AccessWaiting();
00220 }
00221 
00222 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00223   * @brief  Read ADC register (Non-block mode).
00224   * @param  uAddr: Register address
00225   * @param  pBuffer: Buffer pointer of register data
00226   * @param  uLen: Length of read
00227   * @retval None
00228   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00229 void ADC24_ReadRegNonBlock(u32 uAddr, u8 *pBuffer, u32 uLen)
00230 {
00231   ADC24Buffer[0] = uAddr;
00232 
00233   I2CMaster.uSlaveAddress = HFCFG_I2C_SLAVE_ADDRESS;
00234   I2CMaster.Tx.puBuffer = (u8 *)&ADC24Buffer[0];
00235   I2CMaster.Tx.uLength = 1;
00236   I2CMaster.Rx.puBuffer = pBuffer;
00237   I2CMaster.Rx.uLength = uLen;
00238   I2CMaster.uTimeout_us = 1000000;
00239 
00240   I2CMaster_WriteRead(I2C_MASTER_CH0, &I2CMaster);
00241 }
00242 
00243 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00244   * @brief  Read ADC register.
00245   * @param  uAddr: Register address
00246   * @param  pBuffer: Buffer pointer of register data
00247   * @param  uLen: Length of read
00248   * @retval None
00249   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00250 void ADC24_ReadReg(u32 uAddr, u8 *pBuffer, u32 uLen)
00251 {
00252   ADC24_ReadRegNonBlock(uAddr, pBuffer, uLen);
00253   ADC24_AccessWaiting();
00254 }
00255 
00256 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00257   * @brief  Wait I2C access finished.
00258   * @retval None
00259   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00260 void ADC24_AccessWaiting(void)
00261 {
00262   I2CMaster_Status_Enum I2CResult = I2C_MASTER_GOING;
00263 
00264   do {
00265     I2CResult = I2CMaster_GetStatus(I2C_MASTER_CH0);
00266   } while (I2CResult == I2C_MASTER_GOING);
00267 }
00268 
00269 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00270   * @brief  Interrupt Handler of ADC.
00271   * @retval None
00272   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00273 void ADC24_IRQHandler(void)
00274 {
00275   gIsDRDYB_IntTrigger = TRUE;
00276 }
